A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Didn’t answer any questions from the previous movies\, weak characters with predictable story lines made this another over hyped Star Wars\, the last Jedi had a decent start with lots of hope but in the end fell very very short of what it should’ve been. This coming from lifelong fan\, from the book to the videos games and movies. They could’ve done so much more with certain character but chose not to address many fan theories or questions regarding them.
